categories.name: Galvanized Steel Products
categories.description: Premium galvanized steel materials with superior corrosion resistance for construction, manufacturing, and industrial applications.
categories.overview: Galvanized steel is carbon steel that has been coated with a layer of zinc to prevent rust and corrosion. This protective zinc layer acts as a barrier between the steel and environmental elements, making it ideal for both indoor and outdoor applications.
advantages: Superior corrosion resistance extending product lifespan
Cost-effective protection compared to other coatings
Versatile for both indoor and outdoor applications

products.name: Galvanized Steel Coil
products.description: High-quality hot-dipped galvanized steel coils with various zinc coating weights, suitable for construction, automotive, and home appliance applications.

products.name: Galvanized Steel Plate
products.description: Precision-cut galvanized steel plates for construction, manufacturing, and engineering applications requiring excellent corrosion resistance.

products.name: Galvanized Steel Pipe
products.description: High-strength galvanized steel pipes for fluid transportation, structural applications, and scaffolding with excellent corrosion resistance.

products.name: Galvanized Roofing Sheet
products.description: Durable corrugated and trapezoidal galvanized roofing sheets for commercial and residential construction with excellent weather resistance.

standards.name: ASTM A653/A653M
standards.grade: CS (Type A, B, C), FS (Type A, B), SS (Grade 33, 37, 40, 50, 80)
standards.finish: Regular Spangle, Minimized Spangle, Zero Spangle

standards.name: JIS G3302
standards.grade: SGCC, SGCH, SGC340, SGC400, SGC440, SGC490, SGC570

standards.name: EN 10346
standards.grade: DX51D, DX52D, DX53D, DX54D, DX56D, S220GD, S250GD, S280GD, S320GD, S350GD
standards.finish: Normal Spangle, Minimized Spangle, Skin-passed, Oiled

applications.name: Construction
applications.description: Used in roofing, wall cladding, structural components, HVAC systems, and building frameworks where corrosion resistance is essential.

applications.name: Manufacturing
applications.description: Essential for automotive parts, home appliances, electrical equipment, furniture, and industrial machinery components.

applications.name: Infrastructure
applications.description: Utilized in water distribution systems, highway guardrails, street furniture, transportation equipment, and utility structures.

categories.name: Stainless Steel Products
categories.description: Premium stainless steel materials with exceptional corrosion resistance for architectural, food processing, chemical, and industrial applications.
categories.overview: Stainless steel is a steel alloy with a minimum of 10.5% chromium content, which provides superior corrosion resistance. The chromium forms a passive layer of chromium oxide that prevents surface corrosion and blocks further corrosion from spreading into the metal's internal structure.
advantages: Exceptional corrosion resistance in various environments
Attractive aesthetic appearance with various finishes

products.name: Stainless Steel Coil
products.description: High-quality stainless steel coils in various grades and finishes for diverse applications requiring corrosion resistance and aesthetic appeal.

specifications.Finish: 2B, BA, No.1, No.4, HL, Mirror, Hairline, Satin

products.name: Stainless Steel Plate
products.description: Durable stainless steel plates ideal for architectural, food processing, chemical, and structural applications requiring superior corrosion resistance.

products.name: Stainless Steel Bar
products.description: Precision stainless steel bars in round, square, flat, and hexagonal shapes for manufacturing, construction, and engineering applications.

products.name: Stainless Steel Pipe
products.description: Corrosion-resistant stainless steel pipes for fluid transport, food processing, chemical, and architectural applications with excellent durability.

standards.name: ASTM A240/A240M
standards.description: Standard specification for chromium and chromium-nickel stainless steel plate, sheet, and strip for pressure vessels and general applications

standards.name: ASTM A276
standards.description: Standard specification for stainless steel bars and shapes

standards.name: ASTM A312
standards.description: Standard specification for seamless, welded, and heavily cold worked austenitic stainless steel pipes

standards.name: ASTM A666
standards.description: Standard specification for annealed or cold-worked austenitic stainless steel sheet, strip, plate, and flat bar

applications.name: Food & Beverage
applications.description: Ideal for food processing equipment, commercial kitchens, breweries, and dairy facilities due to its hygiene and corrosion resistance.

applications.name: Architecture
applications.description: Used in facades, railings, elevators, and decorative elements where aesthetic appeal and durability are essential.

applications.name: Chemical Processing
applications.description: Critical for storage tanks, heat exchangers, valves, and piping systems in aggressive chemical environments.

categories.name: Carbon Steel Products
categories.description: High-quality carbon steel materials for structural, manufacturing, and general engineering applications with excellent strength and durability.

products.name: Carbon Steel Coil
products.description: Versatile carbon steel coils for manufacturing, construction, and general engineering applications.

specifications.Grades: Q195, Q215, Q235, Q345, SS400, SPCC, SPHC

products.name: Carbon Steel Plate
products.description: Heavy-duty carbon steel plates for structural applications, machinery manufacturing, and shipbuilding.

products.name: Carbon Steel Bar
products.description: Solid carbon steel bars in various shapes for construction, manufacturing, and mechanical applications.

products.name: Carbon Steel Pipe
products.description: Durable carbon steel pipes for fluid transport, structural applications, and general engineering uses.

categories.name: Structural Steel Products
categories.description: High-strength structural steel sections for construction and infrastructure applications, including H-beams, I-beams, angle steel, and channel steel.

products.name: H-Beam Steel
products.description: Load-bearing H-beams for commercial buildings, industrial structures, and infrastructure projects.

products.name: I-Beam Steel
products.description: Traditional I-beam sections for construction, industrial support structures, and bridges.
